Content: <voice name="Joanna"> <lang xml:lang="en-US"> I think i've had enough. </lang></voice>
<voice name="Joanna"><lang xml:lang="en-US"> I'm a little tipsy. </lang></voice>
<voice name="Joanna"><lang xml:lang="en-US"> Ok, one for the road. </lang></voice>
<voice name="Joanna"><lang xml:lang="en-US"> Nice to meet you! </lang></voice>
Não, me perdi. Você poderia explicar novamente, por favor?
<voice name="Joanna"> <lang xml:lang="en-US"> Are you following me? </lang></voice>
<voice name="Matthew"> <lang xml:lang="en-US"> No, you’ve lost me. Could you explain that again, please? </lang></voice>
Desculpe, sobre o que estava falando?
<voice name="Joanna"><lang xml:lang="en-US"> Are you with me? </lang></voice>
<voice name="Matthew"><lang xml:lang="en-US"> Sorry, what was that again? </lang></voice>
Poderia me explicar de outra forma, por favor?
Poderia me explicar mais uma vez, por favor?
<voice name="Matthew"><lang xml:lang="en-US"> Could you explain that another way, please? <break time="2s"/>
<voice name="Matthew"><lang xml:lang="en-US"> Could you explain that just one more time, please? <break time="2s"/>
